main event: A single bright white object was observed for 40 minutes over Hatboro, Pennsylvania in April 1967.
interesting points: The object moved about in a random manner within a limited area, appearing to be as bright as a distant searchlight but much closer and smaller.
The object had two white lights in the front and also had two white lights to the south when it was directly overhead.
The witness estimated the object was about 300 feet away and moving at a speed of 150 mph.
The object eventually went 'straight out into space' and disappeared from view.
The witness had never seen this or a similar object before.
